Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content:
The official Komodo statement on K64:

 Komodoâ€™s overall goal is to provide developers with the ability to build independent and self-sovereign smart chains that avoid the reliance of single-chain blockchain platforms. As such, Komodo has in no way endorsed the Komodore64(K64) project, nor are we responsible for vetting projects that build on Komodoâ€™s open source technology. We are deeply concerned with several seemingly false statements made by members of the K64 team regarding project investments and we strongly advise those interested in participating in their project to practice extreme caution and due diligence ahead of time.
